QuestData.Title: When the Going Gets Tough, Cheat
QuestData.Description: I just can't get my invention to work! Gah!$b$bThat's it, I've decided. I'm going to cheat and use magic.$b$bWhat my invention really needs is a solid piston that's thin enough to fit through a narrow copper tube, but strong enough to withstand repeated impact without breaking. The magical rods carried by those ogre magi to the north should work perfectly.$b$bFrom what I can tell, only the instructors carry the strong staves.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain an Instructor's Rod from an Ogre-Mage Instructor at Camp Kosh.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't like to stoop to using magic on my inventions, but this is somewhat of an emergency.
QuestData.RewardText: A perfect fit! My goat puncher is finally finished!
